Detailed Description

template<class CTYPE, class PTYPE>
class Mutation::Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider< CTYPE, PTYPE >

This class implements a generic provider allowing client code to create arbitrary types of polymorphic objects.

Author
Andrea Lani
